website_summaries.verdict: The style-savvy Skullcandy Roc Nation Aviator headphones earn our recommendation for balancing a unique thematic design with exceptional clarity in spite of a slightly passive low-end response.
pros: The stylish Roc Nation Aviator headphones reach beyond Skullcandy's tween demographic and bring a sophisticated look and detailed sound design to the mobile market
cons: The Aviators are light on bass and may not satisfy those expecting thumping sound

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones! Normally skullcandy's are a middle of the road headphone. These are not. The sound is amazing with great highs and can even pump out some nice lows. Got these initially for a trip and now I use them for gaming on my ps4. I can no longer play with tv speakers. Changes the experience greatly. The memory foam on them is so comfortable. I can wear these for hours with no pain or annoyance. I gave 4 stars because occasionally when I'm chatting on the ps4 my mic cuts out and I have to unplug and replug which usually works. Other than that these are fantastic and at an awesome price!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Maxson

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't want anything else, at this point.
customer_reviews.text: They are GREAT, I love them! The only thing I would have to complain about is, when I am using them in teamspeak or skype, the person on the other end claims to hear echoing. This could just be my computer, I haven't looked into it, at all. Either way, the sound quality is great, they are comfortable, I can wear them for hours upon hours and never get a headache. Cartilage, on the tops of my ears, kind of gets sore after about 8 hours of constant use, but nothing to gripe about. Just be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Its ok but I'm going to look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Its ok. The comfort is not bad but its not good. The treble is really the focus here making the bass sound empty sometimes and EQing sometimes fix the problem.They also do not isolate noise whatsoever, this can be good or bad but to me it was bad. They do not bleed sound which is nice. They look nice to but feel flimsy and cheap where the earcups are. These are simply ok
customer_reviews.author: Coolhjoe67

customer_reviews.title: Look great, but fit is a bit too tight for comfort
customer_reviews.text: These headphones look great and sound pretty good (although not amazing). The downside is that they squeeze a bit too tight, which puts unpleasant pressure on the temples and jaw. In a completely non-scientific study, I asked another person to try them on and they complained of the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua A

customer_reviews.title: Headphones that transport to higher level of sound experience.
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. Great design, exceptionally well made, fantastic sound quality in the full range of music. Bought one for me, then my son, and now about to get another set for my nightstand. Every time the price drops -- these must be surely an undiscovered secret. Did I mention the box and leather pouch? Surely worth the investment by themselves and illustrates Skullcandy's commitment to quality and aesthetics. I also own their earbud headphones, with and without mic. You must hear these products -- simply great gear.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and awesome sounds
customer_reviews.text: I have big ears that extend out from my head quite a ways and the pads on these earphones make it so my ears don't hurt after wearing them :). They do heat up my ears a little bit after wearing them, but I'm not sure how to prevent that with over the ears headphones. I'm probably going to get a metal lunchbox to put them in for transportation. I got them used for 70% off (otherwise I couldn't afford them).
customer_reviews.author: TCF

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but too small
customer_reviews.text: I have a large head, hat size 7 7/8, so these headphones are too small. Unfortunately, I must have large ears since the pads are on my ear not over. But the Aviators work well with my iPhone. The sound is clear and natural, so I will tolerate a little discomfort. At this price point, nothing else comes close to the performance of the Aviator. If Skullcandy reads this, I will pay a premium for a larger size!
customer_reviews.author: Steven S

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones Ever!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is amazing for the price, I bought it at $85 and these are way better than any other headphones at the price. They do cancel out sound (ride on the bus and I can only see peoples mouths moving), its very stylish, looks beautiful and are very comfortable around the ear. The cable is long enough, although the volume adjustment works only with apple devices. I have a Galaxy S4 and the play/pause, rewind/skip button works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge R.

customer_reviews.title: awesome headphones
customer_reviews.text: These over ear headphones are great and not to much money. The highs, mids, and lows, are all mix really well pretty good bass to. but you have to wear them in first for like a day. they look great sound good what more can you ask for, oh your thinking of getting beats by dr. dre well these dont have as much bass punch as beats but they hang in with them really well and they dont cost as much. Order some trust you wont regret i. Oh and they are super soft barely even know they are on your head.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on these headphones wherever I go. The sound is so true, the bass so deep and the noise canceling ear muffs- perfect. Also use them to talk on the phone when I'm cleaning the house or walking down the street. In the winter, they double as ear warmers!
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: I'm not any type of expert on sound, but I do love these headphones! The midlevel sounds are quite clear; bass is not too distorted (but definitely not loud if that's what you're looking for). They're quite comfortable and, on a side note, the packaging is nifty.
customer_reviews.author: A. H.

customer_reviews.title: Skullcandy Quility
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, you get the thump of the base while still being able to her the highs just fine. Construction wise these things are solid. The headband is made of aluminum so it is solid. The only problem is after long periods of wear, 5 plus hours, my ears start to ache.
customer_reviews.author: Scoot

customer_reviews.title: Great set of Headphones.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great set of headphones. I work in an open office environment and these are great to block out distraction. They are not sound cancelling but they are extremely comfortable to wear for extended periods of time. The sound quality is great. The highs are crisp and clean and the lows are punchy and not muffled. They are well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Gortney

customer_reviews.title: Headphones are great, the wire sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are great, the wire sucks. You can hear loud scratching sounds anytime the wire brushes against anything, which also goes through to anyone you're talking to using it as a headset.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I love them. As a person with a lot of ear piercings I was worried that they wouldn't fit or they would feel weird but they are awesome. And the sound quality is the best of any headphones I have owned, I just wish there was a little more noise cancellation but over all Skullcandy did it for me again!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: These by far are the finest quality head phones I've ever listened to
customer_reviews.text: These by far are the finest quality head phones I've ever listened to, the tone quality is amazing, plus they have the best warranty available, they stand behind there products for lifetime. Skullcandy rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Totten

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, look, and price!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are what I've been wanting for along time now and now that I got them, they are the best headphones I have purchased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoying these
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't ever tried skull candy's over the ear headphones, so I was nervous to buy these. The reviews I read said that they were as good as other top brands. Now that I have my set, I have to agree. As far as wearing them, they are well cushioned without feeling heavy or bulky. They do seem a bit wide on my head. They still fit comfortably, I just think it looks a little off - maybe I just have to get used to it. Overall, I love these.
customer_reviews.author: Krista D.

customer_reviews.title: Skullcandy Aviator Review
customer_reviews.text: These particular Skullcandy Aviator headphones i purchased are very nice, produce quality crisp sound, the fit is a bit bulky but they are light weight so that's easy to over look, the only minus i would say for the headphones is that they can have a smidgen more base, however like i said they sound good and look good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kenrick Walley

customer_reviews.title: Comfy headphones, with great quality
customer_reviews.text: I've used these as my airplane headphones for years now- they are comfortable and functional!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia MZ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived looking brand new, I doubt it had ever been taken out of the case. No cosmetic wear at all, one of the best purchases I have ever made, these headphones are superior to Beats in every way.
customer_reviews.author: L.J. Curl

customer_reviews.title: it' good
customer_reviews.text: Satisfactory state of things. Was a good deal. I was delighted to see the state of things. However, the status of the headset is worn out pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Hwang Ki young

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my 15 year old son
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift he had been asking for. I asked why he liked them he said they are good quality and rugged. Just as expected
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia K Owens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones, I think that they look awesome and sound great.
customer_reviews.author: El-Dave-O

customer_reviews.title: So cool
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are very comfortable and I like how cool they look. The most important thing is that they sound great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Android issue
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the quality of the product. My issue was the mic portion was not compatible with my android devices. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Baty

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set Of Headphones............
customer_reviews.text: Well...in my opinion, you can never really go wrong with anything from Skullcandy (again, thats my opinion) and my Son needed a Pair for All his music Listening gadgets that he has and Off a Recommendation from a friend I gave these a shot and I am happy to report that my Son loves them ! He's been using them none stop for months now and they are well made, nice fit and comfortable.....no probs. So....if you are in the hunt for a pair of pretty darn good Headphones...then I totally Reco these !
customer_reviews.author: JRiz

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great
customer_reviews.text: I had the same earphones in white and decided to by my BF a pair. He just loves them. The sound it great and they fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: ADA

customer_reviews.title: My third pair...two as spares
customer_reviews.text: I like this set of headphones, sound is great. The main seller for me is the ability to swap out cords. I bought other skull candy head sets for my 12 yo as well. I became tired of spending money on nice headphones then breaking the cable at the plug when the phone is in my pocket. Had to toss some really nice headphones due to cable breakage. With this set I just replace the cable when it becomes frayed. These also are some of the best fitting headphones that I have owned and the retro style looks cool. For back ups I also like the leather storage / travel case... Great product get them while still available!
customer_reviews.author: Glen E ThomasTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Flying high
customer_reviews.text: These have been discontinued but they certainly meet my needs. And, I especially liked the price. Plus, they look really cool. People on my last flight commented on them.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny78734

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love my headphones! The not only sound amazing but are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lee B.

customer_reviews.title: I guess that's the risk you take when you buy things online...
customer_reviews.text: I don't believe the headphones I received are as listed... I think these are an older model, but I looked passed that. However, the volume increase button does not work, which annoys me because they are supposed to be brand new.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Nice Skullcandy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for your Mobile device! All treble, midrange and bass is equally heard even at low levels. Perfect for long phone calls! Very comfortable to wear!
customer_reviews.author: M. Heath

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My nephew had wanted these for awhile now and so the price sealed the deal. He uses them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, not outstanding. The weakest point goes to sound isolation, that is inexistent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: looks great but it squeezes your head and may give you a headache
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Unparalleled
customer_reviews.text: For the price and the quality, I honestly just hope I can find a pair to match them when they do finally die.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Longo

customer_reviews.title: It's Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these headphones. I used to have a tendency to listen to my music at loud volumes with my old headphones, but now, I love the fact that with these ones, I can just have the music at a low volume and be cool with it. I'd definitely recommend these headphones! I'm pleased with the design, how comfortable they feel on my ears, and the affordable price on Amazon. I was considering buying them on the actual website but I'm glad I came here.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: good headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are good looking headphones with average audio quality. If you are expecting best fidelity, buy another model/brand I recommend it to anyone looking for looks over sound
customer_reviews.author: Diego R.

customer_reviews.title: Skullcandy S6AVFM-156 Aviator Headphones with Mic3 (Black)
customer_reviews.text: THEY FIT GREAT, I LOVE THE TRAVEL BAG AND DETACHABLE CABLE SO I CAN KEEP IT SAFE. MAKING PHONE CALLS WITH IT IS THE BEST FOR WHEN I AM IN NYC WORKING. GOOD STUFF
customer_reviews.author: Don Sheneman

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great! Crisp and clean with absolutely no distortion throughout the volume range. They're very comfortable to wear for long periods of time. Only thing I have an issue with is the lack of hard hitting bass. Great for classical or alternative genres.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob B.

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are the way to go.
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I fell for the marketing of the Beats and bought a pair of the Studio's and let's just say that I was really let down. They sound like a $50 dollar pair rather then a $300 pair. Then when I started doing research thinking that it was just mine, tons of people said the same thing. The skull candy aviators had gotten good reviews so I decided to give them a try and wow what a difference. These headphones sound much better and they're cheaper too. Now I just laugh at the people who sport the Beats.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M Bazell III

customer_reviews.title: they are amazing
customer_reviews.text: these accessories are of excellent quality and I like a lot, they arrived on time and in good condition ready to use
customer_reviews.author: Mario Enrique Carbo

customer_reviews.title: Not the headphones I ordered
customer_reviews.text: these are not the S6AVFM-156 Aviators, they are the older version. The ones I ordered have a cord that comes out and they are supreme sound. They are still great headphones though.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H. Jenssen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought these headphones as a birthday present for my son. He loves them! Great sound and keeps surrounding sound from interfering with his music, and his work!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Altchech

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love them they are exactly what I paid for Great quality headphones I can use for when I'm lounging around the house
customer_reviews.author: Clearsandwich

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the quality of the sound the comfort is really good and skull candy certainly earned their reputation. The best earphones Ive ever used with no hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Eric I.

customer_reviews.title: husband loves these
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my husband and he loves them! Great sound quality! For the price they were a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh C.

customer_reviews.title: Skullcandy S6AVFM-156 Aviator
customer_reviews.text: Just a little mistake, the botton doesn't work well. Otherwise, the headphone is beautiful and the sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: Yu Chan

customer_reviews.title: Syllabus aviator headphones
customer_reviews.text: Headphones were almost new and arrived promptly. The quality of sound is very good.
customer_reviews.author: agustin ponce de leon

customer_reviews.title: Huge bang for the buck!  Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome great specs, THD and frequency response. Love them better the Bose noise cancelling and my friend says they are better sounding then his Dr.Beats!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Freshwater

customer_reviews.title: Skull candy aviator headphones
customer_reviews.text: headphones are awesome was in best buy one day tried them with every type of rock style on my ipod thrash metal punk and hardrock and their perfect fir my head and done mess up my hair, stylish, way better than beats headphones the beats have 2 much bass and these headphones kick them to the curb get em people.
customer_reviews.author: mavericmatt

customer_reviews.title: Dope Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love the headphones. The look, the feel, the comfort of wearing them for long periods of time, and most importantly the sound... They can't be beat...
customer_reviews.author: Ayobami

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: The price for a good quality headphones is outrageous, this might not be the best on the market, but for price it gives you the best value.
customer_reviews.author: joshua shimko

customer_reviews.title: great phones
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound, fit, design. Tweaked just right. And now here are the required twelve more words to complete this.
customer_reviews.author: Snoop Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Read My review for good explanation on these
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a top of a line, noise canceling headphones, i recommend you do not buy these. They do not cancel sound around you and the headphones and much comfortable after and hour. Yea they are very comfortable for a bit, but the cushion is a little too soft which makes the solid part of the headphone touch your ear and it starts to hurt after a while. Maybe this is just me but i do have a big head, so if you have a big head, i highly recommend you look for another pair of headphone which suits your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Abrahamdasilva9

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My son enjoys them for listening to music. Was a good value and a good pair of head phones for the money.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Good
customer_reviews.text: Cons. Very short cord (4 foot), not meant for computer use, or need to get 8 foot cord. I wear glasses and wearing the heads phone hurt after half hour. Not as strong as others have praised. Ear piece bent off as the cord was to short and moving out of cord range pulled on ear piece, a paper clip fixed that, not returning, to much trouble. Positives, look really good even with paper clip, also very good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lovers

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I got these to replace my old skull candies, that I broke. These things are awesome and look cool. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Teza

customer_reviews.title: A Little Small
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good but the ear cups are a little small for my ears. If the fit was a little better they would be a four star headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: exactly what its cracked up to be. I wouldn't buy anything else
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: It took a while for them to kick in, but these are by far and away the best headphones I've ever purchased. NOTE: not all 3.5mm cables will fit into the headphone port as it is a bit snug as a result of the piece of metal sticking out but with sound like this i can make do
customer_reviews.author: iamwhoiamwhoiam

customer_reviews.title: The sound is good, but the Mic is NOT compatible with laptops ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good, but the Mic is NOT compatible with laptops or any software in PCs, like skype, google hangout or whatever and that's awful. It's compatible with cellphones, like apple and nexus. The case is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Lamounier Moura

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones for style and quality, i recommend it 110%. =]
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones because i made the money for them, i used to have skullcandy hesh, but then they broke over a year. these headphones are more conferrable and stylish then most skullcandy's in my point of view.
customer_reviews.author: ErrorUnknown

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked well while it lasted, not as long as I would've hoped.
customer_reviews.author: SirAlex

customer_reviews.title: Skull Candy, exactly.
customer_reviews.text: I had an opportunity to sample these versus the Beats. Both have good quality, but for this price you get a great deal. The Beats are great, but your paying for Bass. I'm a Skullcandy fan.
customer_reviews.author: James Timothy Brooks IV

customer_reviews.title: It's wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This headphone is looked very nice and fashion. Maybe the sound is heard not very professional, but in my opinion, it's worth as its price, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lu Xuxiang

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great and got here in a short amount of time. Overall Im very happy with the skullcandy aviator headphones.
customer_reviews.author: bacon

customer_reviews.title: Expensive with Low-end Components and Terrible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The cable connector on my Aviator's broke when plugged into a jack on an airplane, during the 1st month of use. The cable is really flimsy. When I tried to contact Skullcandy customer service for a replacement - phone, email (several), and twitter - I received no response. Ever. The sound quality is ok, but you are much off buying a set of similarly priced Sony's. Skullcandy the company seems to only care about celebrities when it comes to customer service, and have a company ethos built around ignoring any type of product criticism. The headphones are cheaply made, you are paying for the marketing hype, not solid electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Redman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: volume control does not work very well if at all.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect such low quality for this kind of money. The cord clearly won't last and the construction of these headphones is highly questionable. At least I am happy that I didn't pay $150 for them at Dell.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W

customer_reviews.title: Unusually unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift to someone, he used them 3 times & 1 of the ears stopped working. I love Amazon but I am NOT pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Shamyna

customer_reviews.title: This Aviator is not S6AVFM-156 !
customer_reviews.text: This Aviator is not S6AVFM-156 ! I receive a headphones with model:S6AVDM-003.It's the older version of Skullcandy Aviator.As a Overseas buyer I have no idea to Return it,but i am angry.
customer_reviews.author: pp911

customer_reviews.title: L
customer_reviews.text: Better i wanna cancel This order headphone and my money back , my friends os going back to Brasil tomorow!!

product_meta.title: Skullcandy Aviator (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackFROM THE MANUFACTURER


Pair Skullcandy with an organization like Jay-Z's Roc Nation, and the end result is a crossbreed of street-level swagger and sophisticated class. With an optics-inspired design (see the custom styled drivers for yourself) and a focus on performance, the Aviator is the Porsche of the headphone arena. Take charge of the conversation, and the music, with in-line Mic3, while Attacking Bass, Natural Vocals, and Precision Highs deliver the purest experience in audio – no matter the genre. In function, form, and fit, the Aviator is Supreme Sound at its finest. 

Supreme Sound FEATURES AND HIGHLIGHTS
 * Supreme Sound delivers Attacking Bass, Natural Vocals and Precision Highs
 * Take or make calls, control volume, play/pause, or track/control with Mic3
 * Soft leather touch memory foam ear pillows provide ultimate comfort
 * Highest-grade materials ensure unmatched durability and style
 * Includes detachable cable for mobility and Aviator travel bag.

Soft, comfortable ear pillows WHAT IS ATTACKING BASS?
Most headphones' bass is either suppressed and muddy or exaggerated and boomy. Skullcandy's Supreme Sound “Attacking Bass” experience hits with punchy and powerful bass that's engineered for your music. 

Highest-grade materials NATURAL VOCALS
You have probably heard headphones with hollow or tinny vocals that sound like they're coming from an AM radio. Supreme Sound lets you hear warm and smooth vocals as if you were standing beside your favorite singer. 

PRECISION HIGHS
Skullcandy engineers their headphones to produce clean and spacious highs, not piercing or muted highs like you've probably heard in other headphones. Supreme Sound delivers perfect highs for the final element of an amazing audio experience.
feature_bullets: Supreme Sound delivers Attacking Bass, Natural Vocals and Precision Highs. Mic3 delivers complete control of any IOS device.
Soft leather touch memory foam ear pillows provide ultimate comfort.
Highest-grade materials ensure unmatched durability and style.
Detachable cable for mobility. Aviator travel bag stores your assets in safety and style.
Mic3 -Take or make calls , volume control, play/pause, track control. Carry Case

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars206 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
